Key Match Events: Will Smith hit the game-tying home run
Shohei Ohtani singled in the go-ahead run
Mookie Betts delivered a two-run single
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Roberts expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers couldn't muster much offense off Padres right-hander Joe Musgrove through six scoreless innings
Others: Walker Buehler pitched brilliantly, allowing just one run with five hits in five innings
First baseman Freddie Freeman left the game with a right ankle injury
